metadata.synopsis: AD that Raphael plays in Sharess Caress just before he poofs away in a huge flame and teleports to the House of Hope, after the player dealt too much damage to him.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_ASharess Caress, upper floor, Raphael's roomAttack Raphael, until he'll has less than 50% of his hitpoints.

0.text: Enough! The deal is off the table.
0.context: NodeContext: Annoyed - player just attacked him repeatedly. It didn't hurt, but he's annoyed, and vanishes from sight after speaking
